linkInternal.label: SAP S/4HANA Best Practices Internal Jam
SAP S/4HANA Best Practices and Services
SAP Business Suite 4 SAP HANA GTM Jam

longDescription:
Accelerate and simplify the adoption of SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Management in the cloud for faster time to value, using SAP Best Practices business processes with the knowledge of being legally compliant in different countries.

The Enterprise Management Cloud provides pre-configured content for core business processes in finance, procurement, manufacturing and supply chain. These processes are supported by SAP Fiori for a role-specific, intuitive and simpler user experience. To complement the business processes, embedded analytics and Fiori Overview pages add real-time insight into data.

In addition, the cloud offers SAP Best Practices for integration to other cloud solutions, such as SuccessFactors Employee Central and Ariba. SAP Best Practices for Migration complements the foundation and offers customers a non-disruptive, simplified transition to SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Management Cloud. The guided configuration allows a simpler configuration, automated testing, and content life-cycle management to support agile adoption of continuous innovation even after go-live.

releaseNotes: Sourcing and Procurement: Serial Number Management (BLL), Requisitioning (18J), Ariba -Sourcing Integration (1A0)
Manufacturing: Make-to-Order Production - Semifinished Goods Planning and Assembly (1BM)

Sales: Accelerated Customer Returns (BKP), Sales Contract Management (I9I), Credit Memo Processing (1EZ), Debit Memo Processing (1F1), Supplier Activity Management (19C), Supplier Classification and Segmentation (19E)

Finance: Statutory Reporting Framework Reports (1J2), Accounting and Financial Close - Parallel Ledger (1GA), Asset Accounting - Parallel Ledger (1GB), Asset under Construction - Parallel Ledger (1GF), Event-Based Revenue Recognition - Project-Based Services (1IL), Bank Integration with Financial Services Network (16R), Profit and Loss Plan Data Load from File (1HB), Ariba – Integration for Finance (19O)
Analytics: Customer Project Analysis (BGI), Utilization Analysis (BGJ), Fiori Overview Pages for Sales and Distribution (1BS)
New: Flexible Ledger to allow companies to choose between single or parallel ledger accounting

serviceName: Quick-start implementation of SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Management Cloud

Performing customer defined configuration in the solution using the guided configuration tool

shortDescription: Accelerate and simplify the adoption of SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Management in the cloud for faster time to value, using SAP Best Practices business processes with the knowledge of being legally compliant in different countries.
shortServDesc: With this service, companies can quickly deploy the SAP Best Practices for SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Management Cloud. The service enables a customer to experience the simplification and innovation delivered by SAP S/4HANA across Finance, Sales, Procurement, Manufacturing, Project Services & Asset Maintenance LOBs deployed on the SAP Cloud.

softwareRequirements:
• SAP S/4HANA Enterprise Management Cloud 1608
  • Browsers for Microsoft Windows:
    • Internet Explorer (minimum 11.x), or
    • Google Chrome (latest version), or
    • Mozilla Firefox (Latest RRC 2 / latest ESR)
  • Browser Apple MacOSX:
    • Apple Safari (latest version)
  • For integration:
    • Ariba Network (current version)
    • SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central (current version)
    • Financial Services Network (current version)
    • Vertex (US Only - current version)
whatDoWeDeliver: Conduct solution validation workshops and fit to standard analysis
Complete configuration for customer defined options and assist in defect resolution for unit tests
Conduct solution walk-through with key project stakeholders
whatDoYouNeedToDo: Define chart of accounts, organizational structure and sample master data
Request the Q-System and the P-System
Provide fixed contact people in the business and IT departments
Attend solution validation and solution walkthrough workshops
Prepare and perform master data load
Perform end-user training and organizational change management
Prepare cutover plan and execute cutover tasks
